course.title: PSY 3142 Drugs and Behaviour (3 units)
course.desc: Behavioural pharmacology, psychotropic drugs, drug classes, therapeutic indications, abuse potential, societal impact of drugs. Current research in drugs and behaviour.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2301. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
